name: Buddiest Universe - Day Off
description:
Our buddy is in his Day off today, do his tasks and have a fun free time!

New update! Included :

  • Load game in main menu bug fixed
  • Save game problem fixed
  • Removed bar GUI
  • New Game problem fixed
  • Mail problem in new game
  • Hotspot 5 removed
  • Mail changed from bill to ...(let player solve this by his own ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Some tips for beginner :

  • [Esc] for quit game
  • [F5] for save game
  • [F7] for load game
  • [F9] Go to main menu(simply like restart the game if you not save your progres)
  • [Right click on mouse] open inventroy
